activities: We provide data protection solutions for businesses.  Our primary business is online backup.  Some of our customers, partners and resellers work with international businesses and locations.
eucountries: Austria, Czech Republic, France, Germany, Ireland, Italy, United Kingdom
personaldata: Basic customer contact information used for typical business communication.  All other data stored with us under our services, which is sent to us and stored by us in an encrypted format.
recoursemech: We have engaged an agreement with the BBB EU Safe Harbor to address any claims against us not complying with Safe Harbor Privacy Principles.
